com.gratex.perconik.activity.ide.listeners

Class IdeCommitListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • sk.stuba.fiit.perconik.core.AbstractRegistrable
      • sk.stuba.fiit.perconik.core.Adapter
        • com.gratex.perconik.activity.ide.listeners.IdeListener
          • com.gratex.perconik.activity.ide.listeners.IdeCommitListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.eclipse.jgit.events.RefsChangedListener, org.eclipse.jgit.events.RepositoryListener, Listener, GitReferenceListener, Registrable

    public final class IdeCommitListener
extends IdeListener
implements GitReferenceListener
    A listener of IdeCommit events. This listener creates IdeCheckinDto data transfer objects and passes them to the Activity Watcher Service to be transferred into the User Activity Client Application for further processing.

    Commit listener listens to Git commit events only.

    Data available in an IdeCheckinDto:

    • idInRcs - current Git commit identifier (40 hexadecimal characters), for example "ffba951d35f710abee873db3f5547043aeb3fde9".
    • rcsServer - see RcsServerDto below.
    • See IdeListener for documentation of inherited data.

    Data available in an RcsServerDto:

    • path - remote origin URL from the nearest Git repository, for example https://github.com/perconik/perconik.git. The nearest Git repository is the first one found on path starting in project root, going through workspace root down to the file system root.
    • type - always "git".
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Pavol Zbell
